Ready when you are! Welcome to the ease and simplicity of Reservationless Pro Plus phone conferencing. You can now host your virtual meetings 24x7x365 because they will be completely automated. You can begin using the conferencing services immediately with your permanent dial-in numbers and entry codes below. Within 30 business days you will be receiving by mail your personalized wallet card and pocket user guide. Please call us at 1.888.203.7900 with any questions.

Phone Conferencing

Your Reservationless Pro Plus Account Information

Chair Code: [account.cec]
Participant Code: [account.pec]
Toll-free dial-in number (US and Canada): [dialinNo.tollfreeno]
International dial-in number: [dialinNo.tollno]

To begin a phone conference
1.
Give your participants the date and time of the call, your dial-in number and your Participant code.
2.
At the specified time, dial your Reservationless Pro Plus dial-in number, then enter your Chair Code followed by #.

Helpful Keypad Commands
*0
Operator assistance - conference
*0*0
Operator assistance-individual
#1
Add a conference security passcode
*1
Dial-out to a participant
#2
Broadcast participant count
*2
Broadcast roll call
#3
Activate/deactivate name record
*3
Lock/unlock conference
#4
Private roll call
*4
Activate/deactivate chairperson disconnect
#5
Activate/deactivate next call start without chairperson
*5
Activate/deactivate name announce
#6
Activate/deactivate lecture mode
*6
Mute/unmute individual lines (including participant)
*7
Access project/account code options
*8
Extend conference time beyond 5 hours
#9
Help menu (including participants)
*9
Activate/deactivate entry and exit tones
88#
Disconnect individual line (including participants)
99#
Disconnect all participants except chair
732#
Activate/deactivate enhanced digital recording
 

Additional Information

Notes
•
Reservationless phone & web conferencing support up to 100 people (connections) by default.
•
To make reservations for larger conferences or those with special requirements please call our Customer Service department at 1.888.203.7900 or 1.973.671.0040.
